eegdash.dataset.DS004369
========================

Blink-Pause-Relation (Competing Speaker Paradigm) (OpenNeuro ``ds004369``). Access recordings and metadata through EEGDash.

Quickstart
----------

**Install**

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install eegdash

**Load a recording**

.. code-block:: python

   from eegdash.dataset import DS004369

   dataset = DS004369(cache_dir="./data")
   recording = dataset[0]
   raw = recording.load()

**Filter/query**

.. tab-set::

   .. tab-item:: Basic

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004369(cache_dir="./data", subject="01")

   .. tab-item:: Advanced

      .. code-block:: python

         dataset = DS004369(
             cache_dir="./data",
             query={"subject": {"$in": ["01", "02"]}},
         )
